title: Game Progress Route
content:
ow get the following options to respond:

It thinks you're one of them, Karlach. Why? Same thing Dammon said. Do you know how to fix this malfunctioning engine? Where is this Steel Watch Foundry? Leave.

The steel watcher will continue to tell you that the foundry is off-limits to visitors and though Karlach is not sure why it thinks she's one of them, she believes that what keeps them going may be similar to her tin can. When you are done with the conversation, enter the door to your left to re
